sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import SlimGridMotion from '../components/SlimGridMotion'; const AllSignage: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Combine all signage images const signageImages = [ '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement2.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting2.jpg', '/signboards/signboard2.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement3.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting3.jpg', '/signboards/signboard3.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement4.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting4.jpg', '/signboards/signboard4.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement2.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting2.jpg', '/signboards/signboard2.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement3.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting3.jpg', '/signboards/signboard3.jpg', ]; useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.6' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.8 }, '-=0.4' ); }, []); const services = [ { title: 'Sign Boards', description: 'Communicate your message with custom signage available in a range of materials for internal & exterior use.', link: '/services/signboards', icon: 'ü™ß' }, { title: 'Pavement Signs', description: 'Catch attention of passers by and increase footfall with free-standing pavement signs available in a range of styles.', link: '/services/pavement-signs', icon: 'üìã' }, { title: 'Projecting Signs', description: 'Mix & match from our range of wall-mounted brackets and customisable panels for signage that can be seen from all angles.', link: '/services/projecting-signs', icon: 'üè∑Ô∏è' }, { title: 'Window Privacy Film', description: 'Add privacy without sacrificing style. The etched finish gives a sandblasted / frosted look to your glass.', link: '/services/window-film', icon: 'ü™ü' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* SlimGridMotion Background */}
{/* Dark Overlay */}
{/* Top Blur for Header */}
{/* Content */}

Signage

We're here to help you promote your business, build your brand or simply just to show your individuality.

Explore Services Get a Quote
{/* Bottom Vignette */}
{/* Services Grid */}

Our Signage Solutions

{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}
0{index + 1}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Learn More
))}
{/* Contact CTA */}

Let's chat about your next project

Call or WhatsApp 01562 227 117

Call Now Book FREE Consultation
); }; export default AllSignage;
